t:
Hearing the baby cry I got up and started walking down the stairs sleepily.



As I slipped, fell and broke my neck, I realized that there was no one else in the house to feed the baby.
c:
Soon the crying stopped and I watched the baby approach me with an evil grin on its face.



#baby #cry #wakeup #fall #break #neck #alone #helpless





Inspired by 'Maggie May'.
